column1: |产品名称|产品型号|功能描述|
|PTZ 摄像机|TC-H324S|2MP 25×星光红外 PTZ 摄像机，最高可达 1920×1080@30fps，最低照度彩色：0.001Lux@F1.5，光学变焦：25×，数字变焦 16×，智能红外，红外范围：150m，S+265/H.265/H.264/M-JPEG，无插件，IP66|

column2: Color: 0.001lux@ (F1.5, AGC ON), BW: 0lux with IR
Dual IR Cut Filter with Auto Switch
Pan Manual Speed: 0.1°~200°/s, Pan Preset Speed: 240°/s
Tilt Manual Speed: 0.1°~120°/s, Tilt Preset Speed: 180°/s
Saturation, brightness, contrast, sharpness, adjustable by client software or web browser
7 Areas for Both Main and Sub Stream
16×16, 24×24,32×32, 48×48, 64x64, 96x96, adaptable size, Letters Such as Week, Date, Time, Total 5 Regions
Event Input, Event Output, Motion Detection, Mask Alarm, Disk Full, Disk R/W Error, IP Address Conflict, MAC Address Conflict, FTP Server Exception
Tripwire, Double Tripwire, Perimeter, Object Abandon, Object Lost,Demographics(People Counting), On Duty Detection, Video Abnormal, Audio Abnorma
TCP/IP, ICMP, HTTP, HTTPS, FTP, DHCP, DNS, DDNS, RTSP, PPPoE, NTP, UPnP, SMTP, QoS, IPV4, MULTICAST
Auto store video in SD card when NVR disconnected, and upload video to NVR when resumed connection (Only Support Tiandy ANR NVR)
Built-in MicroSD card slot, up to 512 GB
15 languages  Simple Chinese, Traditional Chinese, English, Spanish, Korean, Italian, Turkish, Russian, Thai, French, Polish, Dutch, Hebraism, Arabic, Vietnamese
IP66, Lightning protection, surge protection and voltage transient protection meets EN 55035:2017
